name: Grilled Chicken Salad
howto: Grill the chicken breast, chop it, and mix with fresh vegetables. Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Salmon with Quinoa
howto: Bake the salmon with a slice of lemon on top. Serve with cooked quinoa and steamed broccoli.

name: Oatmeal with Berries
howto: Cook oats with almond milk. Top with mixed berries and a drizzle of honey.

name: Avocado Toast with Egg
howto: Toast the bread, mash avocado on top. Add a fried or poached egg and sprinkle with chilli flakes.

name: Lentil Soup
howto: Saut√© chopped vegetables, add lentils and broth. Simmer until lentils are soft.

name: Greek Yogurt with Nuts
howto: Combine Greek yogurt with a mix of walnuts and almonds. Drizzle with honey.
